name: Temple Square
address: 50 N Temple, Salt Lake City, UT 84150
description: A 10-acre complex in downtown Salt Lake City, home to the Salt Lake Temple and historic buildings.

name: Utah State Capitol
address: 350 State St, Salt Lake City, UT 84103
description: An elegant neoclassical building offering tours and panoramic views of the Salt Lake Valley.

name: City Creek Center
address: 50 S Main St, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
description: An open-air shopping center with a retractable roof, creek, and upscale shops and dining.

name: Liberty Park
address: 600 E 900 S, Salt Lake City, UT 84105
description: A large public park with a pond, walking trails, playgrounds, and the Tracy Aviary bird sanctuary.

name: Red Butte Garden
address: 300 Wakara Way, Salt Lake City, UT 84108
description: A botanical garden and arboretum with trails and outdoor concerts in the foothills of the Wasatch Range.

name: The Leonardo Museum
address: 209 E 500 S, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
description: An interactive museum combining science, technology, and art for hands-on learning experiences.

name: Hogle Zoo
address: 2600 Sunnyside Ave S, Salt Lake City, UT 84108
description: A 42-acre zoo housing over 800 animals from around the world with themed habitats and exhibits.
